entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 24. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Snow beginning in the morning. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 14.
